references.paper_title: Deep double descent: Where bigger models and more data hurt

references.paper_title: Deep inside convolutional networks: Visualising image classification models and saliency maps
references.reason: This paper introduces Grad-CAM, which is a crucial method utilized by the current paper to visualize and analyze input saliency in DNNs.
